feed.title: HeyForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.6
entry.content:
• Fix attachments of submissions can not be downloaded error (#37)
  • Fix submissions not properly displayed after schema change (#29)

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.5...v0.0.6

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.7
entry.content:
New Features

  • Add environment variables to deailing with SSL email endpoints (port 465) (#40)
  • Add an environment variable to disable new user creation (#35)
  • Add webp and svg to common mime types (#34)

Improvement

  • Simplify apk process in Dockerfile by using --no-cache option by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/42
  • Improve Chinese language by @vfasky in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/50
  • Fix date format not defined error https://v2ex.com/t/1028657#r_14545378

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.6...v0.0.7

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.8
entry.content:
New Features

  • Add Other option to Multiple choice (#31)
  • Add hidden fields (#32)
  • Add multilingual support (#36)

New Contributors

  • @yangchuansheng made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/57

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.7...v0.0.8

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.10
entry.content:
New Features

  • Add form embed support (#66 https://docs.heyform.net/emebd-your-form)
  • Add global exception filter (https://github.com/orgs/heyform/discussions/74)

Improvement

  • Fix form render route redirect error
  • Fix load env error for database migration (#74)
  • Fix multiple choice form logic breaks the whole form (#75)
  • Fix missing logic and other properties when duplicating a form(https://discord.com/channels/1220284271437152287/1220284272036810754/1233236967639224363)

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.8...v0.0.10
